title: Contract On The President
description: Which side would win?On one side was President Harry Prentice, a brilliant, ruthless politician, sworn to use every legal and illegal weapon within his vast arsenal to destroy a conspiracy that was on the verge of taking over the nation.On the other side was an organization that the public still thought of as a gang of criminals called the Mafia, but which now had grown to hold sway over the bulk of business and industry in America and was poised to make its ultimate power grab.In the space of a few incredibly taut, nerve-shattering weeks, the fate of the United States would be decided...
author: John Crosby
